sources.title: 1940 Rosen In Tirol ( Hans Moser, Hans Holt, Johannes Heesters, Theo Lingen, Leo Slezak, Dorrit Kreyssler, Erika Von Thellmann)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1940. Rosen in Tirol.  U.a mit Hans Moser,Johannes Heesters und Theo Lingen

metadata.Plot: Princess Rosemarie learns about the philandering of her husband and plans to catch him in the act. But the Prince is elsewhere, and a substitute has been recruited, dashing Count Herbert who falls in love with Rosemarie, and she with him.
metadata.Actors: Hans Moser, Marte Harell, Johannes Heesters
